definitions: A special file in ASP.NET MVC and Razor Pages applications that defines common layout settings and code to be executed before any view or page is rendered.
A convention-based file used to avoid repetition of layout and common code across multiple views.
examples: The _ViewStart.cshtml file sets the default layout for all views.
You can override settings from _ViewStart.cshtml in individual views.
Ensure _ViewStart.cshtml is correctly configured for consistent page rendering.
